targets.rawSql:
SELECT (
(SELECT count(a.nombre)
        FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
            inner join gestion.parroquia d on d.id = a.id_parroquia
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join gestion.category f on f.id = a.id_categoria
            inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
            inner JOIN  gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id            
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
            LEFT JOIN  public.user w ON w.id = j.id_user
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria
        where a.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8) and g.name in ($subcateg)
			  and k.nombre in ($resolutorg) 
			  and a.id not in (SELECT a.id 
        							 	FROM gestion.caso a 
        						 		inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
        								LEFT JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
                    		LEFT JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
        								where a.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8) and g.name in ($subcateg)
        								and k.nombre not in ($resolutorg)))
+
 (SELECT count(a.nombre)
        FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
            inner join gestion.parroquia d on d.id = a.id_parroquia
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join gestion.category f on f.id = a.id_categoria
            inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
            inner JOIN  gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id            
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
            LEFT JOIN  public.user w ON w.id = j.id_user
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria
      where a.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8) and g.name in ($subcateg)
			and k.nombre in ($resolutorea) 
			and a.id not in (SELECT a.id 
      							 	FROM gestion.caso a 
      						 		inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
      								LEFT JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
                  		LEFT JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
      								where a.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8) and g.name in ($subcateg)
      								and k.nombre not in ($resolutorea))
      and b.id in (SELECT id_estado FROM gestion.resolutorio where nombre in ($resolutorg)))
+
(SELECT count(distinct a.nombre)
	   	FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
            inner join gestion.parroquia d on d.id = a.id_parroquia
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join gestion.category f on f.id = a.id_categoria
            inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
            inner JOIN gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id            
            inner JOIN gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id 
            inner JOIN gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria
        where a.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8) and g.name in ($subcateg)
			  and k.nombre in ($resolutorg,$resolutorea)
			  and a.id not in (SELECT a.id
        							 	FROM gestion.caso a 
        						 		inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
        								LEFT JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id 
                    		LEFT JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
        								where a.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8) and g.name in ($subcateg)
        								and k.nombre not in ($resolutorg,$resolutorea))
			 and a.id not in (SELECT a.id
								FROM gestion.caso a
									inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
									inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
									inner join gestion.parroquia d on d.id = a.id_parroquia
									inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
									inner join gestion.category f on f.id = a.id_categoria
									inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
									inner JOIN gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id            
									LEFT JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id 
									LEFT JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
									LEFT JOIN  public.user w ON w.id = j.id_user
									LEFT JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria
							  where a.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8) and g.name in ($subcateg)
									and k.nombre in ($resolutorea) 
									and a.id not in (SELECT a.id 
															FROM gestion.caso a 
															inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
															LEFT JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id 
															LEFT JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
															where a.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8) and g.name in ($subcateg)
															and k.nombre not in ($resolutorea)))
			 and a.id not in (SELECT a.id FROM gestion.caso a
          									inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
          									inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
          									inner join gestion.parroquia d on d.id = a.id_parroquia
          									inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
          									inner join gestion.category f on f.id = a.id_categoria
          									inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
          									inner JOIN  gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id            
          									LEFT JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
          									LEFT JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
          									LEFT JOIN  public.user w ON w.id = j.id_user
          									LEFT JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria
          								where a.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8) and g.name in ($subcateg)
          									  and k.nombre in ($resolutorg) 
          									  and a.id not in (SELECT a.id 
          																FROM gestion.caso a 
          																inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
          																LEFT JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id 
          																LEFT JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
          																where a.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8) and g.name in ($subcateg)
          																and k.nombre not in ($resolutorg))))
          																) as total;

SELECT count(*)
        FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
            inner join gestion.parroquia d on d.id = a.id_parroquia
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join gestion.category f on f.id = a.id_categoria
            inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
            inner JOIN  gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id            
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
            LEFT JOIN  public.user w ON w.id = j.id_user
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria
        where a.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8) and g.name in ($subcateg)
			  and k.nombre in ($resolutorg) 
			  and a.id not in (SELECT a.id 
        							 	FROM gestion.caso a 
        						 		inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
        								LEFT JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
                    		LEFT JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
        								where a.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8) and g.name in ($subcateg)
        								and k.nombre not in ($resolutorg));

SELECT count(*)
        FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
            inner join gestion.parroquia d on d.id = a.id_parroquia
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join gestion.category f on f.id = a.id_categoria
            inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
            inner JOIN  gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id            
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
            LEFT JOIN  public.user w ON w.id = j.id_user
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria
        where a.id_estatus in (6) and g.name in ($subcateg)
			  and k.nombre in ($resolutorg) 
			  and a.id not in (SELECT a.id 
        							 	FROM gestion.caso a 
        						 		inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
        								LEFT JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id 
                    		LEFT JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
        								where a.id_estatus in (6) and g.name in ($subcateg)
        								and k.nombre not in ($resolutorg));

SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::decimal * 100 / ( SELECT count(*)
									        FROM gestion.caso a
									            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
									            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
									            inner join gestion.parroquia d on d.id = a.id_parroquia
									            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
									            inner join gestion.category f on f.id = a.id_categoria
									            inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
									            inner JOIN gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id            
									            LEFT JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
									            LEFT JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
									            LEFT JOIN  public.user w ON w.id = j.id_user
									            LEFT JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria
									        where a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8) and g.name in ($subcateg)
												and k.nombre in ($resolutorg) 
												and a.id not in (SELECT a.id 
				        							 	FROM gestion.caso a 
				        						 		inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
				        								LEFT JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id 
				                    		LEFT JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
				        								where a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8) and g.name in ($subcateg)
				        								and k.nombre not in ($resolutorg)))::decimal,2) as porcentaje
	      


	    FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
            inner join gestion.parroquia d on d.id = a.id_parroquia
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join gestion.category f on f.id = a.id_categoria
            inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
            inner JOIN  gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id            
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
            LEFT JOIN  public.user w ON w.id = j.id_user
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria
        where a.id_estatus in (6) and g.name in ($subcateg)
			  and k.nombre in ($resolutorg) 
			  and a.id not in (SELECT a.id 
							 	FROM gestion.caso a 
						 		inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
								LEFT JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id 
            		LEFT JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
								where a.id_estatus in (6) and g.name in ($subcateg)
								and k.nombre not in ($resolutorg));

SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
            inner join gestion.parroquia d on d.id = a.id_parroquia
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join gestion.category f on f.id = a.id_categoria
            inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
            inner JOIN gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id            
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
            LEFT JOIN  public.user w ON w.id = j.id_user
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria
      where a.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8) and g.name in ($subcateg)
			and k.nombre in ($resolutorea) 
			and a.id not in (SELECT a.id 
      							 	FROM gestion.caso a 
      						 		inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
      								LEFT JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id 
                  		LEFT JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
      								where a.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8) and g.name in ($subcateg)
      								and k.nombre not in ($resolutorea))
      and b.id in (SELECT id_estado FROM gestion.resolutorio where nombre in ($resolutorg));

SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
            inner join gestion.parroquia d on d.id = a.id_parroquia
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join gestion.category f on f.id = a.id_categoria
            inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
            inner JOIN gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id            
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
            LEFT JOIN  public.user w ON w.id = j.id_user
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria
      where a.id_estatus in (6) and g.name in ($subcateg)
			and k.nombre in ($resolutorea) 
			and a.id not in (SELECT a.id 
      							 	FROM gestion.caso a 
      						 		inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
      								LEFT JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id 
                  		LEFT JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
      								where a.id_estatus in (6) and g.name in ($subcateg)
      								and k.nombre not in ($resolutorea))
      and b.id in (SELECT id_estado FROM gestion.resolutorio where nombre in ($resolutorg));

SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::decimal * 100 / (SELECT COUNT(*)
										        FROM gestion.caso a
										            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
										            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
										            inner join gestion.parroquia d on d.id = a.id_parroquia
										            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
										            inner join gestion.category f on f.id = a.id_categoria
										            inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
										            inner JOIN gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id            
										            LEFT JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
										            LEFT JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
										            LEFT JOIN  public.user w ON w.id = j.id_user
										            LEFT JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria
										      where a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8) and g.name in ($subcateg) and k.nombre in ($resolutorea) 
											  and a.id not in (SELECT a.id 
							      							 	FROM gestion.caso a 
							      						 		inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
							      								LEFT JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id 
							                  		LEFT JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
							      								where a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8) and g.name in ($subcateg)
							      								and k.nombre not in ($resolutorea))
										      and b.id in (SELECT id_estado FROM gestion.resolutorio where nombre in ($resolutorg))
										      )::decimal,2) as porcentaje
	    FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
            inner join gestion.parroquia d on d.id = a.id_parroquia
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join gestion.category f on f.id = a.id_categoria
            inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
            inner JOIN gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id            
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
            LEFT JOIN  public.user w ON w.id = j.id_user
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria
      	where a.id_estatus in (6) and g.name in ($subcateg)
			and k.nombre in ($resolutorea) 
			and a.id not in (SELECT a.id 
      							 	FROM gestion.caso a 
      						 		inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
      								LEFT JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id 
                  					LEFT JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
      								where a.id_estatus in (6) and g.name in ($subcateg) and k.nombre not in ($resolutorea))
      		and b.id in (SELECT id_estado FROM gestion.resolutorio where nombre in ($resolutorg));

(SELECT a.nombre::Text "CODIGO CASO",
    	e.cedula::Text "CEDULA", e.nombre::TEXT "DENUNCIANTE",
    	e.telefono::Text "TELEFONO", b.nombre::Text "ESTADO", c.nombre::Text "MUNICIPIO", d.nombre::Text "PARROQ", a.descripcion::TEXT "DESCRIP", 
	  	f.name::Text "CATEGORIA", g.name::Text "SUBCATEG",case when m.name is null then 'Sin ExtCateg' else m.name end::Text "EXTCATEG", 
		i.nombre::Text "ESTATUS"
        FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
            inner join gestion.parroquia d on d.id = a.id_parroquia
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join gestion.category f on f.id = a.id_categoria
            inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
            inner JOIN  gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id            
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
            LEFT JOIN  public.user w ON w.id = j.id_user
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria
        where a.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8) and g.name in ($subcateg)
			  and k.nombre in ($resolutorg) 
			  and a.id not in (SELECT a.id 
        							 	FROM gestion.caso a 
        						 		inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
        								LEFT JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id 
                    		LEFT JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
        								where a.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8) and g.name in ($subcateg)
        								and k.nombre not in ($resolutorg)))
union
 (SELECT a.nombre::Text "CODIGO CASO",
    	e.cedula::Text "CEDULA", e.nombre::TEXT "DENUNCIANTE",
    	e.telefono::Text "TELEFONO", b.nombre::Text "ESTADO", c.nombre::Text "MUNICIPIO", d.nombre::Text "PARROQ", a.descripcion::TEXT "DESCRIP", 
	  	f.name::Text "CATEGORIA", g.name::Text "SUBCATEG",case when m.name is null then 'Sin ExtCateg' else m.name end::Text "EXTCATEG", 
		  i.nombre::Text "ESTATUS"
        FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
            inner join gestion.parroquia d on d.id = a.id_parroquia
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join gestion.category f on f.id = a.id_categoria
            inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
            inner JOIN  gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id            
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
            LEFT JOIN  public.user w ON w.id = j.id_user
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria
      where a.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8) and g.name in ($subcateg)
			and k.nombre in ($resolutorea) 
			and a.id not in (SELECT a.id 
      							 	FROM gestion.caso a 
      						 		inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
      								LEFT JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id 
                  		LEFT JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
      								where a.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8) and g.name in ($subcateg)
      								and k.nombre not in ($resolutorea))
      and b.id in (SELECT id_estado FROM gestion.resolutorio where nombre in ($resolutorg)))
union
	(SELECT  DISTINCT ON (a.nombre) a.nombre::Text "CODIGO CASO",
	    --a.codigo::Text "CODIGO CASO",
    	e.cedula::Text "CEDULA", e.nombre::TEXT "DENUNCIANTE",
    	e.telefono::Text "TELEFONO", b.nombre::Text "ESTADO", c.nombre::Text "MUNICIPIO", d.nombre::Text "PARROQ", a.descripcion::TEXT "DESCRIP", 
	  	f.name::Text "CATEGORIA", g.name::Text "SUBCATEG", case when m.name is null then 'Sin ExtCateg' else m.name end::Text "EXTCATEG", 
		i.nombre::Text "ESTATUS"
	   	FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
            inner join gestion.parroquia d on d.id = a.id_parroquia
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join gestion.category f on f.id = a.id_categoria
            inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
            inner JOIN  gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id            
            inner JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
            inner JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria
        where a.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8) and g.name in ($subcateg)
			  and k.nombre in ($resolutorg,$resolutorea)
			  and a.id not in (SELECT a.id
        							 	FROM gestion.caso a 
        						 		inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
        								LEFT JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id 
                    		LEFT JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
        								where a.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8) and g.name in ($subcateg)
        								and k.nombre not in ($resolutorg,$resolutorea))
			 and a.id not in (SELECT a.id
								FROM gestion.caso a
									inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
									inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
									inner join gestion.parroquia d on d.id = a.id_parroquia
									inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
									inner join gestion.category f on f.id = a.id_categoria
									inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
									inner JOIN  gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id            
									LEFT JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
									LEFT JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
									LEFT JOIN  public.user w ON w.id = j.id_user
									LEFT JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria
							  where a.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8) and g.name in ($subcateg)
									and k.nombre in ($resolutorea) 
									and a.id not in (SELECT a.id 
															FROM gestion.caso a 
															inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
															LEFT JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
															LEFT JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
															where a.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8) and g.name in ($subcateg)
															and k.nombre not in ($resolutorea)))
			 and a.id not in (SELECT a.id FROM gestion.caso a
          									inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
          									inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
          									inner join gestion.parroquia d on d.id = a.id_parroquia
          									inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
          									inner join gestion.category f on f.id = a.id_categoria
          									inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
          									inner JOIN  gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id            
          									LEFT JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
          									LEFT JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
          									LEFT JOIN  public.user w ON w.id = j.id_user
          									LEFT JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria
          								where a.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8) and g.name in ($subcateg)
          									  and k.nombre in ($resolutorg) 
          									  and a.id not in (SELECT a.id 
          																FROM gestion.caso a 
          																inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
          																LEFT JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id 
          																LEFT JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
          																where a.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8) and g.name in ($subcateg)
          																and k.nombre not in ($resolutorg))));

panels.title: LISTADO DE CASOS CON RESPONSABILIDAD COMPARTIDA  ($resolutorg )

list.definition: SELECT name FROM gestion.category WHERE id in (8,9,10,11,12,13)
list.label: SUB CATEG
list.name: subcateg
list.query: SELECT name FROM gestion.category WHERE id in (8,9,10,11,12,13)

list.definition: SELECT nombre FROM gestion.resolutorio a where a.id_tipo_resolutorio = 1 order by nombre
list.label: GOBERNACIONES
list.name: resolutorg
list.query: SELECT nombre FROM gestion.resolutorio a where a.id_tipo_resolutorio = 1 order by nombre

list.definition: SELECT a.nombre FROM gestion.resolutorio a inner join gestion.resolutorio b on a.id_estado = b.id_estado where a.id_tipo_resolutorio = 2 and b.nombre in ($resolutorg)
list.label: ALCALDIAS
list.name: resolutorea
list.query: SELECT a.nombre FROM gestion.resolutorio a inner join gestion.resolutorio b on a.id_estado = b.id_estado where a.id_tipo_resolutorio = 2 and b.nombre in ($resolutorg)
